bug.author: neerajprad
bug.summary: MCMC with multiple chains is broken with pytorch 1.3
bug.description: There is some issue with torch.mutiprocessing in pytorch 1.3 <denchmark-code>RuntimeError: error executing torch_shm_manager at "/Users/npradhan/miniconda3/envs/pytorch-36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/bin/torch_shm_manager" at ../torch/lib/libshm/core.cpp:99 </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: I think this should be fixed by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/2125>pytorch/pytorch#2125</denchmark-link> .
Closing this as it is fixed upstream.
